hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/229254542acf7fbed9bcd40606fe3131.png)

$\begin{align}&\green9 \text{ Jada's marshmallows}\\
+&  \underline{\blue7 \text{ Hunter's marshmallows }}\\
=&\pink{16} \text{ marshmallows in total}\end{align}$

question.content:
Jada added $9$ marshmallows to some hot chocolate, and Hunter added $7$ marshmallows.

**Write a number sentence to show how many marshmallows Jada and Hunter added.**

 [[☃ input-number 3]] $ = 9 + $ [[☃ input-number 4]]
